title: @Riot KateyKhaos
body: Sorry if this is not the right sections, but can you please brighten up or make the vitals on Pool Party Fiora easier to see please? As it stands they are very difficult to see, especially in fights in brush or vs champs with lots of effects around them. Please consider this.

replies.body: Hey!  I didn't personally work on this skin, but I'd be happy to bring this up to the folks who did and let them make a call. :)
Can we have an illaoi skin pls?
Thank you, that'd be great. I really like this skin, but its sub optimal to use, especially in ranked, because of how it puts you at a disadvantage, and that's kinda a bummer, especially for 1350 RP.
i 100% agree with this. The pool party vitals from fiora are extremely hard to notice especially when the enemy is actually using skills
